channel.title: blog on Cupper
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Cupper

item.title: First Blog
item.description: First Blog Create new branch for your blog git checkout -b first-blog Move your branch to latest code from git git fetch --all git reset --hard origin/master Copy sample mark file cp content/post/test-post.md content/post/first-blog.md Update title/tags/date Write some content Commit your changes git add . git commit -m "my first blog" Push your branch git push origin first-blog Create PR Wait for approval
